Deicidal Eye.name: Deicidal Eye
Deicidal Eye.fullText:
Godhunter Utility 26Deicidal Eye

Your merciless perspective reveals every weakness, no matter how insignificant.

Daily        Martial
Minor Action      Close burst 10

Target: One creature in the burst

Effect: Your attacks ignore any resistance or immunity possessed by the target, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to your attacks. This effect lasts until you are reduced to 0 hit points or until you use the power on a new target.

Special: Increase the vulnerability by 5 if the target is higher level than you or if the target is a solo monster. Increase the vulnerability by 10 if the target is both.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 154.
